comments.author: david.humphrey@senecacollege.ca
comments.text:
Created attachment 526174
Patch against rev b59521d4350d

For a project I was working on a while ago, I needed the ability to get info on every pref touched during a browser session.  I wrote a patch to add NSPR logging to give this info.  I'm not sure if we need/want to take this, but it was useful enough to what I was doing that I figured I should file it, even if only to put the patch somewhere others could find it.

To use:

$ export NSPR_LOG_MODULES=nsPref:5
$ export NSPR_LOG_FILE=/tmp/pref.log
  <..run Firefox..>
$ cat /tmp/pref.log | grep PREF | uniq
